results.title: Simvastatin attenuated sickness behavior and fever in a murine model of endotoxemia.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuated @DISEASE_Mental_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@sickness behavior@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ model of @DISEASE_Endotoxemia @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@endotoxemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Oliveira MK, Dos Santos RS, Cabral LDM, Vilela FC, Giusti-Paiva A. Simvastatin attenuated sickness behavior and fever in a murine model of endotoxemia. Life Sci. 2020 Aug 1;254():117701. PMID: 32387414

results.title: Dose-finding study of high-dose simvastatin combined with standard chemotherapy in patients with relapsed or refractory myeloma or lymphoma.
results.text_hl: The maximum tolerated dose was 15 mg/kg/day @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. The most frequently reported side-effects were @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal CTC@@@ grade 1-2 and @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@neutropenic fever@@@.

citations.NLM: van der Spek E, Bloem AC, van de Donk NW, Bogers LH, van der Griend R, Kramer MH, de Weerdt O, Wittebol S, Lokhorst HM. Dose-finding study of high-dose simvastatin combined with standard chemotherapy in patients with relapsed or refractory myeloma or lymphoma. Haematologica. 2006 Apr;91(4):542-5. PMID: 16585018
